attributes.additional_details:
http://conservativehome.blogs.com/columnists/2007/08/theresa-may-m-3.html

Under her watch police forces have seen their funding cut by £2.3 billion despite a promise to maintain front line services. And who can forget the passport fiasco?

The fact that she cannot find someone to head up the child abuse enquiry is very worrying.

She said that "Brexit is Brexit" but in the almost six months that she has been in office we have no word about how Brexit will be done.
attributes.background:
In 2007 when Gordon Brown took office  Theresa May said that we need a General Election as he has no democratic mandate and his reputation has been tainted by his mistakes in office.
The PM must be tested against her own policies seeing as she has no mandate and considering her tainted reputation.
